meanings.sent1: The resetters quickly fixed the broken computer.
meanings.sent2: The resetters at the IT department are very skilled.
meanings.sent3: The resetters decided to have a reset party to celebrate their successful work.
meanings.sent4: The resetters were like magical wizards, bringing life back to the technology.
meanings.sent5: The resetters were the heroes of the office, saving the day with their expertise.

meanings.definition: resetters: a device or mechanism used to reset something
meanings.sent1: The resetters on the machine helped restart it after a power outage.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to always have spare resetters in case one breaks.
meanings.sent3: The resetters in the factory had a race to see which one could reset the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The resetters functioned like a magical button, bringing everything back to its original state.
meanings.sent5: The bright red resetters stood out among the other tools, ready to save the day.
